ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Another survey
ygData.msgSnippet: 0. NAME? Su 1. LIVING ARRANGEMENT? Me and Mom. 2. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING NOW? No books just yet. been taking an online course on javascript though. 3.
ygData.messageBody:
0. NAME? Su
1. LIVING ARRANGEMENT? Me and Mom.
2. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING NOW? No books just yet. been taking an online
course on javascript though.
3. WHAT'S ON YOU'RE MOUSE PAD? Don't have a mousepad right now. using a
piece of paper.
4. FAVORITE BOARDGAME? Trivial pursuit (sp?).
5. FAVORITE SMELLS? Alcohol, tiger balm, coffee, fresh baked choco-chip
cookies, vanilla extract, Noxema, pine, magnolia, and mint.
6. LEAST FAVORITE SMELLS? Ammonia, dead animals, farts, backed up toilets,
my neighbor.
7. FAVORITE SOUND? ocean waves and light thunder.
8. WORST FEELING IN THE WORLD? Knowing that I let someone down or hurt their
feelings.
9. FIRST THOUGHT IN THE MORNING? I'll just sleep for a little bit longer!
10. FAVORITE COLOR? Black.
11.HOW MANY RINGS BEFORE YOU ANSWER THE PHONE? Depends. Sometimes one
sometimes five or seven.
12. FUTURE CHILDS NAME? I am NOT having children. bleh. Might name my cow's
baby something though. not sure what. depends on gender when it's born.
13. WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT IN LIFE? Enjoying yourseld and trying to treat
others like you want to be treated.
14. FAVORITE FOOD? depends on my mood. love steak, chicken, beef stew,
mushroom sauce, thai friend rice...
15. CHOCOLATE OR VANILLA? Chocolate
16. DO YOU LIKE TO DRIVE FAST? Not really. But then I don't like to drive bc
there are soo many idiots on the road.
17. DO YOU SLEEP WITH A STUFFED TOY? I use a stuffed cat as a neck pillow
sometimes when I'm having neck pains.
18. STORMS - COOL OR SCARY? Cool until they make my power go out-- which
happens almost everytime there's a thunderstorm now. Nearly got me killed in
EQ.
19. WHAT TYPE WAS YOUR FIRST CAR? a cherry red '91 Ford Escort LX 4-door
wagon Quirk. I still have it's red hubcaps-- my brother totalled it a few
months ago after I told him not to drive it. :-( Technically the first car I
drove was a Suburban from the 80s, then a pickup truck... but the escort was
my first car.
20. IF YOU COULD MEET ONE PERSON DEAD OR ALIVE? Depends on my mood.
21. FAVORITE SONG? I don't really have one...
22. FAVORITE BOOK? Umm.. I can't remember. It's been so long since I've
actually sat down and read a good book.
23. DO YOU EAT THE STEMS OF BROCCOLI? Yes
24. IF YOU COULD HAVE ANY JOB YOU WANTED WHAT WOULD IT BE? I would get
payed to play Everquest AND get to design new characters and quests. :-)
Seriously, I would love to have a job working from home programming, making
webpages, and doing graphics design.
25. IF YOU COULD DYE YOUR HAIR ANY COLOR? I'd dye it the color of my mom's
hair. Or maybe black.
26. EVER BEEN IN LOVE? No.
27. IS THE GLASS HALF EMPTY OR HALF FULL? Time for a refill. :-) Half full I
guess.
28. FAVORITE MOVIES? Drop Zone, Sleepy Hollow, Scary Movie I & II, Rush Hour
I & II, Stir of Echos, Superman, The Princess Bride, Robin Hood: Men In
Tights, and Willow.
29. DO YOU TYPE WITH YOUR FINGERS ON THE RIGHT KEYS? Yes.
30. WHATS UNDER YOUR BED? Nothing. I sleep on the floor on a mat with a
sleeping bag.
31. WHATS YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER? Don't have one.
32. WHATS YOUR FAVORITE SPORT TO WATCH? Don't have TV, can't watch sports.
Like hockey when people beat the piss out of each other.
33. SAY ONE NICE THING ABOUT THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS TO YOU: umm.. She was
nice to pass this along. :-)
34. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND? Dunno.
35. PERSON YOU SEND THIS TO THAT IS LEAST LIKELY TO RESPOND? My sister.
36. ARE YOU IN A RELATIONSHIP AT THIS MOMENT? No.
37. IF SO WHAT IS HIS/HER NAME? My hand... ;-D
39. DOES HE/SHE LOVE YOU? Only until it gets too cramped.
40. HAVE YOU EVER THOUGHT OF YOU AND UR BOYFRIEND /GIRLFRIEND EVER GETTING
MARRIED? I don't think it's legal...
luv,
-Su
